name: 2018/11/02 Dinner Vegetables
description: This wholesome '2018/11/02 Dinner Vegetables' dish combines the freshness and nutrients of a variety of vegetables enhanced with thyme, resulting in a low-carb, high-fiber meal that fits perfectly into healthy eating plans. Ideal for those looking to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Tomatoes, Green Beans, Enoki Mushrooms, Bell Pepper, and Carrots under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the Tomatoes into wedges, trim the Green Beans, slice the Mushrooms and Bell Pepper, and chop the Carrots into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, melt the Butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped Carrots and Bell Pepper to the skillet. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the Green Beans, Mushrooms, and Tomatoes. Cook for another 10 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Season with Thyme, Salt, and Pepper. Stir well to combine and ensure the vegetables are evenly coated with the seasonings.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
